means: 使清洁( sanitize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: This sanitized account of his life does not mention his time in prison.
sentence.Network_cn: 这份生平记述对他的不光彩之处略而不表，没有提及他在监狱的日子。

sentence.Network_en: He's worried that he's only going to get a sanitized version of what actually happened.
sentence.Network_cn: 他担心事情传到自己耳朵时，已经是净化过的版本。

sentence.Network_en: There's something missing in the sanitized life we lead.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们干净整洁的生活缺少某种东西.

PerfectNetExp.abs: when you manage your home , plan the meals , handle the finances , juggle the calendar , and make sure that family members enter the world relatively groomed and sanitized , you a lot .在你打理你的家，计划三餐，管理经费，翻动日历，确保家人回到一个相对整洁、干净的家时，你做了很多工作。

may be sanitized by pouring boiling water over brush ., 可用开水高温消毒.
sanitize 给消毒, sanitized 化学防菌整理, sanitize 给进行消毒

entry.def: To sanitize an activity or a situation that is unpleasant or unacceptable means to describe it in a way that makes it seem more pleasant or more acceptable.

example.ex: ...crime writers who sanitise violence and make it respectable...
example.tran: 美化暴力使其显得正当的犯罪小说作家

example.ex: He's worried that he's only going to get a sanitized version of what actually happened.
example.tran: 他担心事情传到自己耳朵时，已经是净化过的版本。
